titles.title: Puerto Rico Medicare Reimbursement Equity Act of 2005
Puerto Rico Medicare Reimbursement Equity Act of 2005
A bill to amend title XVIII of the Social Security Act to increase inpatient hospital payments under the Medicare Program to Puerto Rico hospitals.

action.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Finance.

bill.summary: Puerto Rico Medicare Reimbursement Equity Act of 2005 - Amends title XVIII (Medicare) of the Social Security Act to revise the formula for the Medicare inpatient hospital services payment rate for Puerto Rico hospitals to: (1) reduce the applicable Puerto Rico percentage from 25 percent to zero; and (2) increase the applicable Federal percentage from 75 percent to 100 percent.
